formal_statement:
theorem aime_1983_p1 (z w : ℕ)
    (ht : 0 < Real.log z) (hw : 0 < w)
    (h0 : Real.log w =  60 *  Real.log z) :
    Real.log w / Real.log z = 60  := by
goal:
x y z w : ℕ
ht : 1 < x ∧ 1 < y ∧ 1 < z
hw : 0 ≤ w
h0 : (↑w).log / (↑x).log = 24
h1 : (↑w).log / (↑y).log = 40
h2 : (↑w).log / (↑x * ↑y * ↑z).log = 12
⊢ (↑w).log / (↑z).log = 60
name: aime_1983_p1
header:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0

open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat
